title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:1. [Please provide steps to reproduce the issue]
OB: Label height is not updated immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: Label height should dynamically adjust to accommodate the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the UI where the label is displayed.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change to match the new font size.
